00019 #ifndef _COPPERPLATE_HASH_H
00020 #define _COPPERPLATE_HASH_H
00021 
00022 #include <pthread.h>
00023 #include <copperplate/list.h>
00024 
00025 #define HASHSLOTS  (1<<8)
00026 
00027 struct hashobj {
00028         const char *key;
00029         struct holder link;
00030 };
00031 
00032 struct hash_bucket {
00033         struct list obj_list;
00034 };
00035 
00036 struct hash_table {
00037         struct hash_bucket table[HASHSLOTS];
00038         pthread_mutex_t lock;
00039 };
00040 
00041 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_PSHARED
00042 /* Private version - not shareable between processes. */
00043 struct pvhashobj {
00044         const char *key;
00045         struct pvholder link;
00046 };
00047 
00048 struct pvhash_bucket {
00049         struct pvlist obj_list;
00050 };
00051 
00052 struct pvhash_table {
00053         struct pvhash_bucket table[HASHSLOTS];
00054         pthread_mutex_t lock;
00055 };
00056 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_PSHARED */
00057 #define pvhashobj       hashobj
00058 #define pvhash_bucket   hash_bucket
00059 #define pvhash_table    hash_table
00060 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_PSHARED */
00061 
00062 #ifdef __cplusplus
00063 extern "C" {
00064 #endif
00065 
00066 unsigned int __hash_key(const void *key,
00067                         int length, unsigned int c);
00068 
00069 void __hash_init(void *heap, struct hash_table *t);
00070 
00071 int __hash_enter(struct hash_table *t,
00072                  const char *key, struct hashobj *newobj,
00073                  int nodup);
00074 
00075 static inline void hash_init(struct hash_table *t)
00076 {
00077         __hash_init(__pshared_heap, t);
00078 }
00079 
00080 void hash_destroy(struct hash_table *t);
00081 
00082 static inline int hash_enter(struct hash_table *t,
00083                              const char *key, struct hashobj *newobj)
00084 {
00085         return __hash_enter(t, key, newobj, 1);
00086 }
00087 
00088 static inline int hash_enter_dup(struct hash_table *t,
00089                                  const char *key, struct hashobj *newobj)
00090 {
00091         return __hash_enter(t, key, newobj, 0);
00092 }
00093 
00094 int hash_remove(struct hash_table *t, struct hashobj *delobj);
00095 
00096 struct hashobj *hash_search(struct hash_table *t, const char *key);
00097 
00098 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_PSHARED
00099 
00100 int __hash_enter_probe(struct hash_table *t,
00101                        const char *key, struct hashobj *newobj,
00102                        int (*probefn)(struct hashobj *oldobj),
00103                        int nodup);
00104 
00105 int __pvhash_enter(struct pvhash_table *t,
00106                    const char *key, struct pvhashobj *newobj,
00107                    int nodup);
00108 
00109 static inline
00110 int hash_enter_probe(struct hash_table *t,
00111                      const char *key, struct hashobj *newobj,
00112                      int (*probefn)(struct hashobj *oldobj))
00113 {
00114         return __hash_enter_probe(t, key, newobj, probefn, 1);
00115 }
00116 
00117 static inline
00118 int hash_enter_probe_dup(struct hash_table *t,
00119                          const char *key, struct hashobj *newobj,
00120                          int (*probefn)(struct hashobj *oldobj))
00121 {
00122         return __hash_enter_probe(t, key, newobj, probefn, 0);
00123 }
00124 
00125 struct hashobj *hash_search_probe(struct hash_table *t, const char *key,
00126                                   int (*probefn)(struct hashobj *obj));
00127 
00128 void pvhash_init(struct pvhash_table *t);
00129 
00130 static inline
00131 int pvhash_enter(struct pvhash_table *t,
00132                  const char *key, struct pvhashobj *newobj)
00133 {
00134         return __pvhash_enter(t, key, newobj, 1);
00135 }
00136 
00137 static inline
00138 int pvhash_enter_dup(struct pvhash_table *t,
00139                      const char *key, struct pvhashobj *newobj)
00140 {
00141         return __pvhash_enter(t, key, newobj, 0);
00142 }
00143 
00144 int pvhash_remove(struct pvhash_table *t, struct pvhashobj *delobj);
00145 
00146 struct pvhashobj *pvhash_search(struct pvhash_table *t, const char *key);
00147 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_PSHARED */
00148 #define pvhash_init             hash_init
00149 #define pvhash_enter            hash_enter
00150 #define pvhash_enter_dup        hash_enter_dup
00151 #define pvhash_remove           hash_remove
00152 #define pvhash_search           hash_search
00153 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_PSHARED */
00154 
00155 #ifdef __cplusplus
00156 }
00157 #endif
00158 
00159 #endif /* _COPPERPLATE_HASH_H */
